item.title: CVE-2023-49821|2023-12-18T22:31:09.739Z -- livechat -- livechat%20%E2%80%93%20wp%20live%20chat%20plugin%20for%20wordpress
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in LiveChat LiveChat – WP live chat plugin for WordPress.This issue affects LiveChat – WP live chat plugin for WordPress: from n/a through 4.5.15.
